directions: Heat oil in heavy large saucepan over medium heat. Add sausage and onion; Sauté until onion is tender, about 6 minutes. Add broth and kale; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Add beans and wine. Cook until kale is tender, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 6 ounces kielbasa or linguiça sausage, cut into thin rounds
1/2 large bunch kale, stems cut away, leaves thinly sliced
title: Sausage and Bean Soup
